name: Ekune Style LoRA
description:
This is a merge between my own drawing style + three other artists (One of them being Ratatatat74 which seems to be overpowering the most).

So, I called it the Ekune Style LoRA. Though, unfortunately it seems the other styles overpowered my own and only small glimpses appear every once and while but I still like the results. I trained it using 40 pictures varying from when I first started up until last year to make a LoRA of my own art style - It felt lack luster, so I fused it with three other LoRA for better coloring, lighting, etc.

This is an OC of mines to show you my art: Here

It only has four pictures but it shows how I evolved starting from making 2D Chibi characters up to the latest picture.

I suggest using this LoRA at 0.8-1.0 weight for best results.

  • All examples images were generated on AOM2 and Anything V3 VAE.

All pictures were upscaled using these settings:

  • Upscaler: Fatal-Anime 4x

  • Hires. Steps: 25

  • Denoising Strength: 0.5

  • Upscale by 1.5 (768x768)

Embeds and LoRAs used

Bad Prompt - Bea - Misty - Ryuuko - Giovanna - Yohana (OC)

Follow me on Twitter for updates- https://twitter.com/TrueHeroBang

Support - https://ko-fi.com/ekune
